alpha=0.001
relalpha=0.001
# min and max values of x and y
xrange=-10 10
yrange=-10 10
# number of segments
xdelta=200
ydelta=200
# function parameters
m=15
a1=100 200 300 400 500 600 700 800 900 1000 1200 1400 1600 1800 2000
a2=2000 1800 1600 1400 1200 1000 900 800 700 600 500 400 300 200 100
c=2 4 8 16 32 64 128 256 512 1024 2048 4056 2048 1024 51
